short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that automates sending bulk WhatsApp messages using a list of WhatsApp numbers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can now automate sending Whatsapp messages. 
To use this tool, go to Whatsapp web official website, link your Whatsapp account with mobile device (if not already), click on "WABarmga" button, enter the message, a list of phone numbers and specify a time delay between messages, click on "Start" and  keep your browser & internet connection active.
